items.sentence: You don\'t seem to be very worried about that.
Tom is your husband\'s middle name, isn\'t it?
Tom knows he\'s wrong, but he won\'t admit it.
I think that you should add a bit more pepper.
I think you should give Tom your phone number.
I just want to relax and listen to some music.
I know that Tom can do that better than I can.
Tom won\'t be able to do that without my help.
Tom won\'t be able to get anything done today.
Let\'s try that new restaurant on Park Street.
